In March last year Google stopped co-operating with China over censorship- a joint decision that Mr Eric Schmidt said he was happy with. Over time I would hope- especially in my new role with more of an external focus- that I can try to get more of Google, appropriately and within our policies, into China, he told the BBC's economics editor, Stephanie Flanders , at the World Economic Forum in Davos.
